byline.original: By RICK ROJAS and SANDRA E. GARCIA

abstract: Odessa Simms of Harlem is killed by stray bullet while sitting with friends playing dominoes at playground near her home; police say fight broke out at Col Charles Young Playground in Harlem and at least one person opened fire; no arrests have been made.
lead_paragraph: Odessa Simms, 61, had been playing dominoes and cards with friends at the Col. Charles Young Playground when a fight broke out and at least one person opened fire, the police said.
snippet: Odessa Simms, 61, had been playing dominoes and cards with friends at the Col. Charles Young Playground when a fight broke out and at least one person opened fire, the police said....

headline.main: Woman Is Killed by a Stray Bullet at a Harlem Playground
headline.print_headline: Woman Is Killed by a Stray Bullet in Harlem
